DOC.brief_summary: Target enrollment 1000 prospectively enrolled subject initial negative biopsy schedule repeat biopsy . Subjects must negative index prostate biopsy procedure within 30 month schedule repeat biopsy . All enrolled subject core tissue initial negative biopsy blind test assay . All subject serum plasma sample obtain prior DRE , urine sample collect immediately follow DRE advance repeat biopsy ; sample blind sent MDxHealth evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Validation Prostate Biomarkers Repeat Biopsy
DOC.criteria: Males , age 40 year 85 , underwent previous cancernegative prostate biopsy within 30 month schedule repeat biopsy . The initial TRUS guide negative prostate biopsy must collect minimum 10 tissue core section prostate biopsy core collect physician must submit MDxHealth order allow full comprehensive testing/evaluation section patient 's prostate prior schedule repeat biopsy . Minimum tissue volume criterion 20 micron prostate biopsy core tissue available ( 40 micron preferable ) . Previous biopsy histology may include presence highgrade prostatic intraepithelial neoplasia ( HGPIN ) , proliferative inflammatory atrophy ( PIA ) , glandular inflammation , atypical small acinar proliferation ( ASAP ) atypical cell . Tissue extract use standard TRUS guide biopsy core extraction ( transurethral resection prostate ( TURP ) . PreDRE serum sample , preDRE plasma sample , PostDRE urine sample collect advance repeat biopsy . Samples collect within three month schedule repeat biopsy , day , prior , procedure . Patient undergone previously test ConfirmMDx biopsy Patients prior diagnosis prostate cancer previous biopsy . Patients limited life expectancy generally consider repeat Tissue extract use transurethral resection prostate ( TURP ) procedures Patients history cancer ( except basal cell carcinoma )
